# model with z scores and total indivs SE as joint response

                scale.SERIES.l + treatment_yn_clean + 
                resolved_taxa_pair + 
                scale.abs.lat +
                interaction_present.factor +
                scale.elev +
                (1|STUDY_ID))
# model with z scores and total indivs SE as joint response

                       scale.SERIES.l + treatment_yn_clean + 
                       resolved_taxa_pair + 
                       scale.abs.lat +
                       interaction_present.factor +
                       scale.elev +
                       (1|STUDY_ID))
